class.name: Skin
class.brief_description: A resource that stores the bones' [Transform3D] poses.
class.description: Skin is a resource class that serialized the bones' poses to binds. Add binds manually with the methods [method Skin.add_bind], and [method Skin.add_named_bind], get them with [method Skin.get_bind_bone], [method Skin.get_bind_count], [method Skin.get_bind_name], and [method Skin.get_bind_pose]. And asing them with [method Skin.set_bind_bone], [method Skin.set_bind_count], [method Skin.set_bind_name], and [method Skin.set_bind_pose]

method.name: add_bind
method.description: Adds a bone's bind of index [param bone] with the pose [param pose]. [codeblock] var skin = Skin.new() var bone_transform = Transform3D.INDENTITY func _ready(): skin.add_bind(1, bone_transform) [/codeblock]

method.name: add_named_bind
method.description: adds a new bind of pose [param pose] of name [param name].

method.name: clear_binds
method.description: Clears all bones' binds and named poses' binds.

method.name: get_bind_bone
method.description: Returns the bone with the index of the given [param bind_index].

method.name: get_bind_pose
method.description: Returns the pose from the bind index of the given [param bind_index]

method.name: set_bind_bone
method.description: Asings the bind [param bind_index] to the given [param bone]

method.name: set_bind_count
method.description: Asings the bind count to the given [param bind_count].

method.name: set_bind_name
method.description: Asings [param name] to the given [param bind_index].

method.name: set_bind_pose
method.description: Asings the pose [param pose] to the given [param bind_index]
